entities.text: a 30-foot Cuban patrol boat with four heavily armed men
Secretary of Homeland Security Tom Ridge
another career politician who was passed over by Mr. Bush for the vice presidency
Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security Asa Hutchinson
a graduate of the disgraceful Bob Jones University
a political -- of a professional politician
somebody who is elected to public office

these members of the cabinet who by your definition were professional politicians -- Lloyd Bentsen, Les Aspin, William S. Cohen, Janet Reno, Bruce Babbitt, Mike Espy, Dan Glickman, Norman Mineta, Henry Cisneros, Federico Pena, Bill Richardson, Richard Riley
former Democratic National Chairman Ron Brown
one of the great professional politicians of all time
half the woman that Janet Reno was
the top three leaders of his economic team
very few senators or any who are as good in their third term as they are in their first term
everybody in the United States Senate
the 22 senators of the old confederacy
children of Democrats who are not swayed by the same things their mothers and fathers were
